sections.name: detail
sections.title: Perseverance
sections.description: It is a Rover capable to make resarch in any planet in order to perserve humanity thanks to the information collected of planets viables for living. You need to attach the piece 1 to the 2.Piece 3 and 4 are stand alone. In order to get accurate models  you need to print the pieces in the same scale.  For more information visit: https://www.nasa.gov/perseverance

items.title: Order Product
items.description: Your order will arrive according to your parcel service provider and the shipping

items.title: Enable Content
items.description: You will be able to access the content of the product you have purchased and the api dashboard including the 3D models, electronic designs and the instruction to build the product

items.title: Full Pack
items.description: You will be able to access to the order product and the content of the product enabled

items.title: 3D Models
items.description: You need to attach the piece 1 to the 2.Piece 3 and 4 are stand alone. In order to get accurate models  you need to print the pieces in the same scale. For more information visit: https://www.nasa.gov/perseverance

items.title: Electronic Designs
items.description: Please make the pads 1mm and the paths 3mm, this will make the soldering process easier. For more information visit: https://www.nasa.gov/perseverance
You will be able to access to the dashboard API service if you get access to the content. This service allows you to monitor sensors and manage actuators and data of the product.

items.title: Not Recommended
items.description: Needs significant improvement.

items.title: Poor Experience
items.description: Many aspects need improvement.

items.title: Could Be Better
items.description: Some aspects were satisfactory, others were not.

items.title: Average
items.description: Met basic expectations but nothing more.

items.title: Good
items.description: Mostly positive experience.

items.title: Excellent
items.description: Exceeded expectations in all aspects.
